h2_title: Venom Daoist Boss Fight and Guide - Second Encounter
content: Much of the rest of this fight will revolve around avoiding his lengthy combo attacks and retaliating after his last hit, or quickly evading or deflecting his charging dash attacks to stop him in his tracks.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Venom_Daoist.md', within the main section titled 'Venom Daoist', specifically from the subsection 'Venom Daoist Boss Fight and Guide - Second Encounter'.
The content is as follows:
Much of the rest of this fight will revolve around avoiding his lengthy combo attacks and retaliating after his last hit, or quickly evading or deflecting his charging dash attacks to stop him in his tracks.
